name: Pork and Chives Dumpling Filling
description: Pork and chives dumpling filling, a tinge sweet and gingery.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound Chinese chives, finely sliced (see note)
1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
1 tablespoon sugar, or more to taste
about 1 teaspoon ginger, minced or grated with a microplane grater

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all ingredients well in a medium-sized mixing bowl. To taste for seasoning, place a 1/2 teaspoon-sized amount of filling on a microwaveable plate and microwave until cooked, about 10 seconds. Taste, then adjust mixture with more salt or sugar. If not using immediately, cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until you are ready to use, up to 24 hours.
To make and cook dumplings, follow this recipe for homemade dumplings, starting with step 4.
